Fun.Games::
**/roll** - Roll a six-sided die
**/rps** - Rock paper scissors
**/flip** - Flip a coin
Fun.Chat::
**/wave** - Wave to another user
**/repeat** - Have the bot repeat a message
**/hello** - Receive a hello message
**/cat** - Receive a cat gif
**/dog** - Receive a dog gif
**/phart** - Receive the iconic Phartso gif

Admin (Requires Perms).Chat::
**/purge** - Purge a specified number of lines
**/avatar** - Display a user's avatar
**/serverinfo** - Display server info
**/userinfo** - Display user info
**/setnick** - Change a user's nickname
